description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. Max Fun Times is a customizable drinking application that enhances the enjoyment of frosty cold beverages with friends. Spin the wheel and receive a command or customize your own wheel to create your own random fun generator!
description.short: Max Fun Times is a customizable drinking application that enhances the enjoyment of frosty cold beverages with friends. Spin the wheel and receive a command or customize your own wheel to create your own random fun generator!
